author: Leonora Cravotta
title: COVID Exposes Winners and Losers in New School Realities
description:
Wealthier households and districts are able to weather the virtual shift, while low income and special needs kids, not so much. 
The post COVID Exposes Winners and Losers in New School Realities appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Wealthier households and districts are able to weather the virtual shift, while low income and special needs kids, not so much. COVID 19 has temporarily shuttered our brick and mortar schools forcing school administrators to rapidly create and deploy distance… [+7612 chars]
